description: Get ready to celebrate St. Patrick's Day with a bang! This year, ditch the green beer and try out our delicious Liquid Marijuana Shot. This shot mixes spiced&nbsp;rum, melon liqueur, coconut rum, blue curacao, sweet &amp; sour mix, and pineapple juice to create a tasty green drink that will have you feeling festive all&nbsp;night long.Whether you're looking for something to sip on at your party or just want a fun drink to enjoy while watching the parade, this is the perfect cocktail recipe for you!
name: Liquid Marijuana Shot

recipeInstructions.name: In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, pour all the ingredients.
recipeInstructions.text: In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, pour all the ingredients.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour into shot glasses. Serve immediately.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour into shot glasses. Serve immediately.
